package.name: xdot
package.description:
XDot, by Jose Fonseca, is an interactive viewer for graphs written in Graphviz's dot language.
This package adds front-end capabilities to XDot including WX Widget support and a mechanism for receiving callbacks when nodes are clicked. This extension is provided as BSD.
package.author: Jose Fonseca, ROS package and WX frontend by Jonathan Bohren

export.deprecated: This wxWidget based tool is EOL - if you still depend on it consider contributing a Qt based tool i.e. a plugin for rqt
